description: Erection of a 5 storey, single dwelling-house over 4 floors and 1 basement level.
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><br></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><span style="color: black;"><font face="arial, sans-serif">Before any works on site commence, a report highlighting the results from the PHPP software, which shall include the thermal performance (u-value and g-value) of the &nbsp;opaque and transparent elements of the envelope and renewable energy measures, if applicable, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and thereafter all sustainable and renewable energy measures identified shall be implemented wholly in accordance with the approval and before the property is first occupied.</font></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><span style="color: black;"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><br></font></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="color: black;">Reason: In the interest&nbsp;</span><span style="color: black;">of addressing climate change&nbsp;</span><span style="color: black;">and maximising the environmental performance of the building.</span></font></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><br></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><span style="color: black; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><font face="arial, sans-serif">Prior to commencement of the relevant part of the work, the applicant shall submit, and have approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, a detailed drawing, full specifications and a&nbsp;detailed maintenance plan&nbsp;of the&nbsp;biodiverse&nbsp;roof<b>&nbsp;</b>with a minimum substrate depth of 80mm, not including&nbsp;the vegetative mat and details of the green wall. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the&nbsp;details thus approved and shall be fully implemented before the premises are first occupied.</font></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><span style="color: black; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><br></font></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><span style="color: black;"><font face="arial, sans-serif">Reason: To enhance the character and ecology of the development, to provide undisturbed refuges for wildlife, to promote sustainable urban drainage, improve air quality and to enhance the performance and efficiency of the proposed building.</font></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="color: black;">Prior to occupation of the development hereby approved, a full air permeability test report confirming the development has achieved a maximum air permeability of 0.6 ACH<sup>&nbsp;</sup>at 50pa, or any&nbsp;</span><span style="color: black;">average air permeability as proposed in the report to be submitted under the previous condition&nbsp;</span><span style="color: black;">shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.</span></font></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="color: black;"><br></span></font></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin: 0cm; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: normal;"><span style="color: black;"><font face="arial, sans-serif">Reason: In the interest of addressing climate change and to&nbsp;protect local air quality and contribute towards local, regional and national commitments to a net-zero carbon emission future.</font></span></p><div><span style="color: black;"><font face="arial, sans-serif"><br></font></span></div>

<p>There shall be no permanent fixtures to the hereby approved roof garden at Level 4 which would project above the approved balustrade.&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure the there is no unnecessary visual clutter at this elevated position that would harm the character of the streetscene and surrounding area.&nbsp;</p>

<p>Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved cycle parking for 2 cycles shall be provided on site and retained in perpetuity thereafter.</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: In the interests of promoting sustainable modes of transport.&nbsp;</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-left: 56.692913385826756pt;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#00000a;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the occupation of the development hereby approved, at least one bird or bat  box, at or close to eaves level shall be installed and&nbsp; retained thereafter in perpetuity.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-c7aa8f57-7fff-2f7c-f886-5b56394305fc"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-left: 56.692913385826756pt;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#00000a;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To enhance the ecology of the development and provide potential habitat for local wildlife.</span></p>

<p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Prior to the commencement of development full particulars of a Sustainable Urban Drainage System (SuDS), including the following, must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

a) Details of a SuDS that achieves a 50% betterment in surface water run-off rates compared to the existing run-off rates.
b) A detailed scheme for the ownership and maintenance for every element of the surface water drainage system proposed on the site.
c) A strategy which demonstrates how any SuDS and/or attenuation features will be suitably maintained for the lifetime of the development.

The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">Prior to the commencement of development full particulars of a Sustainable Urban Drainage System (SuDS), including the following, must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.<br><br>a) Details of a SuDS that achieves a 50% betterment in surface water run-off rates compared to the existing run-off rates.<br>b) A detailed scheme for the ownership and maintenance for every element of the surface water drainage system proposed on the site.<br>c) A strategy which demonstrates how any SuDS and/or attenuation features will be suitably maintained for the lifetime of the development.<br><br>The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved</span></p><p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;Prior to the commencement of development full particulars of a Sustainable Urban Drainage System (SuDS), including the following, must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

b) A detailed scheme for the ownership and maintenance for every element of the surface water drainage system proposed on the site.
c) A strategy which demonstrates how any SuDS and/or attenuation features will be suitably maintained for the lifetime of the development.

a) Details of a SuDS that achieves a 50% betterment in surface water run-off rates compared to the existing run-off rates.
b) A detailed scheme for the ownership and maintenance for every element of the surface water drainage system proposed on the site.
c) A strategy which demonstrates how any SuDS and/or attenuation features will be suitably maintained for the lifetime of the development.

The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;REASON: To ensure that the development will provide a sustainable drainage system. The condition is required to be discharged prior to the commencement of development to ensure that sustainable drainage is incorporated into the design of the development.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt;">REASON: To ensure that the development will provide a sustainable drainage system. The condition is required to be discharged prior to the commencement of development to ensure that sustainable drainage is incorporated into the design of the development.</span><br></span><br></p>

<p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;">All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.</span></p><p><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;All non-Combined Heat and Power (CHP) space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers installed as part of the development hereby approved shall achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial;"><span data-sheets-value="{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:&quot;REASON: To protect air quality and people’s health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum as a result of the development and to contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedances of National Air Quality Objectives.&quot;}" data-sheets-userformat="{&quot;2&quot;:7037,&quot;3&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:0},&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;6&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;7&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;8&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:[{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;5&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:13421772}},{&quot;1&quot;:0,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;3&quot;:3},{&quot;1&quot;:1,&quot;2&quot;:0,&quot;4&quot;:1}]},&quot;9&quot;:0,&quot;11&quot;:4,&quot;12&quot;:0,&quot;14&quot;:{&quot;1&quot;:2,&quot;2&quot;:0},&quot;15&quot;:&quot;Arial&quot;}" style="font-size: 10pt;">REASON: To protect air quality and people’s health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum as a result of the development and to contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedances of National Air Quality Objectives.</span><br></span><br></p>

<p style="margin-left: 15px;">A scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the site against surface water flood risk shall be submitted to and agreed, in writing with the LPA in consultation with the LLFA prior to the construction of the measures. The scheme shall be carried out in its entirety before the extension is occupied and; constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with current best practices.</p><p style="margin-left: 15px;">Reason: To prevent against flooding in the local area</p>
